column4: I want to learn scripting in perl, what packages do I need for that?
ok, but (I'm reading Learning Perl 3rd) when I do $ ./hello_world (first program ;) ) nothing happens ..
or specifically, this happens: bash: ./hello_world: /url/bin/perl: bad interpreter: No such file or directory
odd. perl should be install. try dpkg -l|grep perl
and dpkg -l perl. isn't it there?
hmm, nothing exept an empty line
and dpkg -l perl. isn't it there?
I thought it does ... it has worked for me ..
